meanings.sent1: The old cat was toothless and could only eat soft food.
meanings.sent2: The baby's smile was adorable and toothless.
meanings.sent3: The toothless puppy tried to chew on a bone, but it just licked it instead.
meanings.sent4: The toothless comb struggled to detangle the knotted hair.
meanings.sent5: The toothless grin of the elderly man was warm and welcoming.

meanings.sent1: The toothless law had no real impact on crime prevention.
meanings.sent2: The toothless security guard couldn't stop the thief.
meanings.sent3: The toothless protest went unnoticed by the government.
meanings.sent4: The toothless warning was ignored by the reckless driver.
meanings.sent5: The toothless ruler had no authority over the rebellious citizens.

meanings.sent1: The toothless knife couldn't cut through the tough steak.
meanings.sent2: The toothless critique lacked any real insight.
meanings.sent3: The toothless joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The toothless argument failed to persuade anyone.
meanings.sent5: The toothless performance left the audience unimpressed.
